title: Influence Quality Price & Image
description: 1\. Which of the product quality, price and brand image have a dominant influence on consumers' decision to buy Cardano Coin (ADA)?
solution: Quantitative, associative methodology. Modern website questionnaire data collection, Likert Scale Assessment. Validity and Reliability.
experience:
• Abdullah, Tamrin dan Tanri, Francis. 2012 Manajemen Pemasara. Jakart: Gafindo. 

• Alhusin, Syahri. Aplikasi Statistik SPSS, Yogyakarta.
